In this news, published in the Argentine newspaper Page 12, comments from Estela Carlotto, president of the Plaza de Mayo Abuelas Association, regarding a decision of the Argentine Court. In the context of speech, the expression “una de cal y otra of arena” is used to
A) refer to the fact that the court decision does not imply its immediate application.
B) highlight the inevitable execution of the sentence.
C) mock the bias of justice in this action.
D) criticize the compulsory collection of genetic material.
E) Emphasize the judicial determination as something consolidated.
